note.p: Welsh-born hostess and biographer. Daughter and co-heiress of Benjamin Waddington and his wife Georgina Marianne Port of Llanover, Monmouthshire. Married Baron Christian Karl Josias Bunsen in 1817. Published a memoir of her husband in 1868.
ODNB s.v. Bunsen, C. K. J. von
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB [1741/13)
Somerset, England, marriage registers, bonds and allegations, 1754–1914 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 December 2022)
